description:
Montreal, April 14, 2014 - According to Alex Gaynor (Rackspace), code review is fun. This talk will explore the benefits of code review, and a number of different workflows to enable it in both open source and commercial software development.

Useful links:
* Rackspace: http://www.rackspace.com
* Alex: https://twitter.com/alex_gaynor
* MP45: http://sflx.ca/mp45e
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Code Review #MP45
